label: Introduction to Metaflow
description: Introducing the Metaflow framework for building Machine Learning pipelines.

lessons.label: Metaflow artifacts
lessons.description: Managing and persisting data across the different steps of a Metaflow pipeline.

lessons.label: Parallel branches
lessons.description: Executing steps in parallel and propagating artifacts through a Metaflow pipeline.

lessons.label: Foreach branches
lessons.description: Creating a dynamic number of parallel branches to process data items independently.

lessons.label: Parameterizing flows
lessons.description: Customizing the execution of a Metaflow pipeline using user-defined parameters.

lessons.label: Including files
lessons.description: Versioning and making local files available across every step of a Metaflow pipeline.

lessons.label: Managing libraries
lessons.description: Installing and managing external dependencies for isolated and reproducible environments.

lessons.label: Compute resources
lessons.description: Requesting and allocating compute resources to handle larger tasks in a Metaflow pipeline.

lessons.label: Environment variables
lessons.description: Accessing environment variables consistently across local and remote pipeline executions.

lessons.label: Visualizing results
lessons.description: Generating custom visualization reports to monitor, debug, and share results from your pipelines.
